Encounter.Name: Gladiator Night - Round 1, Fight 1
Encounter.Notes: This is the first fight, Lasowd the Trandoshan VS. Josteckk the Wookiee. [P] If one of the PC's competeing in the tournament is infact a Wookiee or Trandoshan, it may be wise to insert them into this match in place of one of the compeditors, Wookiees and Trandoshans have a long species rivalry and said rivalry would up the tension as well as providing a reason for an 'accident' to happen should the opponent get close to winning. [P] The winner will proceed to round 2, use these encounters as a template to make round 2, and round 3 (the finals).
